content.raw:
for reference, my `${MKOCTFILE}` points to `/usr/bin/mkoctfile`, and I don't have a `mex` binary on my system. So when I run cmake, I get

~~~
====== Finding 3rd Party Packages ======
-- Operating system is Linux
-- Looking for ronn to generate manpages - found
-- Looking for zmq pkgconfig file - found
-- cppzmq file - found
-- Octave found. mkoctfile at /usr/bin/mkoctfile
-- 	MATLAB mex compiler not found - no mex file generation
~~~

and

~~~
-- Enable upstream CFlags
-- BUILD WARNINGS
-- 	MATLAB mex compiler not found - no mex file generation
-- END BUILD WARNINGS
~~~

but when I make install, `.m` files are installed:
~~~
$ make install | grep "\.m" | grep octave
make -f matlab/CMakeFiles/octave_generation.dir/build.make matlab/CMakeFiles/octave_generation.dir/depend
make -f matlab/CMakeFiles/octave_generation.dir/build.make matlab/CMakeFiles/octave_generation.dir/build
-- Up-to-date: /home/hsu/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hxgz.mex
-- Up-to-date: /home/hsu/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hx_close.m
-- Up-to-date: /home/hsu/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hx_connect.m
...
~~~
content.html:
for reference, my ${MKOCTFILE} points to /usr/bin/mkoctfile, and I don't have a mex binary on my system. So when I run cmake, I get

====== Finding 3rd Party Packages ======
-- Operating system is Linux
-- Looking for ronn to generate manpages - found
-- Looking for zmq pkgconfig file - found
-- cppzmq file - found
-- Octave found. mkoctfile at /usr/bin/mkoctfile
--  MATLAB mex compiler not found - no mex file generation

and

-- Enable upstream CFlags
-- BUILD WARNINGS
--  MATLAB mex compiler not found - no mex file generation
-- END BUILD WARNINGS

but when I make install, .m files are installed:

$ make install | grep "\.m" | grep octave
make -f matlab/CMakeFiles/octave_generation.dir/build.make matlab/CMakeFiles/octave_generation.dir/depend
make -f matlab/CMakeFiles/octave_generation.dir/build.make matlab/CMakeFiles/octave_generation.dir/build
-- Up-to-date: /home/hsu/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hxgz.mex
-- Up-to-date: /home/hsu/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hx_close.m
-- Up-to-date: /home/hsu/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hx_connect.m
...
